title: Pete's pulled pork, slow cooker style
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '2kg bone-in pork shoulder', '1 medium onion, cut into rings', '6 garlic cloves, crushed', '225ml white wine vinegar', '125ml apple vinegar', '250ml chicken stock', '5 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons English mustard powder', '2 tablespoons tomarto ketchup', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '1 pinch ground cinnamon (just a pinch, no more)', 'To serve', '6 to 8 burger buns', '6 to 8 slices smoked cheese', 'coleslaw (I used shop bought)']
